sense.name: The human act of making something new.
sense.examples: The creation of the stadium was a major achievement. Creation is a wonderful process for anyone. From its creation the plan was doomed.

sense.name: The object brought into existence.
sense.examples: She made of herself a new creation. After he made the sculpture, his creation sat untouched. The biggest trees in all creation are in that forest.

sense.name: (Theology) God's act of bringing the universe into existence.
sense.examples: The Creation was an act of awesome power.
